closeConnection() - Method in interface polito.sdp2017.Components.DBManager
It concludes the database session.
closeConnection() - Method in class polito.sdp2017.Components.SQLiteManager
This method close the session.
closeDatabaseConnection(String) - Method in class polito.sdp2017.DesignEnvironmentGui.ApplicationModel
Try to close a connection toward a database whose path is specified as parameter.
Constants - Class in polito.sdp2017.Constants
 
Constants() - Constructor for class polito.sdp2017.Constants.Constants
 
ControlledScreen - Interface in polito.sdp2017.DesignEnvironmentGui
This is interface is implemented by any screen controller of this application; it forces the controllers to implement methods for specifying the application model and for setting the screen parent container.
copyBitstream(FPGAConfiguration) - Static method in class polito.sdp2017.Components.FPGAConfiguration
This method is invoked internally runSynthesis.
createConfiguration(FPGAConfiguration, DBManager) - Static method in class polito.sdp2017.Components.FPGAConfiguration
This method is the core of the configuration creation.
createConfiguration(ActionEvent) - Method in class polito.sdp2017.DesignEnvironmentGui.ScreenCreateConfigController
Listener for events generated by the button for creating a new configuration.
createTCLScript(FPGAConfiguration) - Static method in class polito.sdp2017.Components.FPGAConfiguration
This method generates dynamically the synthesis tcl script, in according to a template, listing all components to be added to the project.
